properties.areaDesc: Jefferson, AL; Walker, AL; Tuscaloosa, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 9:20PM CST until February 20 at 1:03PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Locust Fork At Sayre...
...The flood warning continues for the Black Warrior River At Selden
Lock and Dam...

.Recent heavy rainfall is producing rises along the Locust Fork at Sayre
and the Black Warrior River at Seldon...therefore flood warnings remin
in effect. Levels should be near crest at Sayre...but additional rainfall
expected over the next 24 hours will lead to additional rises at
Seldon.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Locust Fork At Sayre.
* until Thursday afternoon...or until the Warning is cancelled.
* AT 8 PM Wednesday the stage was 25.5 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 25 feet.
* Forecast...The river will continue to fall to below flood stage by
after midnight tonight .
* Impact...At 25 feet...Flooding of low lying wood lands and
agricultural lands along the Locust Fork occurs.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Thursday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
